title.rendered: Pacific Airlines in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam

content.rendered:
Pacific Airlines is a low-cost airline headquartered in Tan Binh District, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam. With its hub at Tan Son Nhat International Airport, Ho Chi Minh City, it operates scheduled domestic and international services along with charter flights. The airline began operations in 1991, flying chartered cargo services. From 1996 to 2005, the airline, along with other local companies, operated under the government-owned Vietnam Airlines Corporation.

Verified & Updated on: 27/04/21

Pacific Airlines Contact Address, Phone, Email, Fax and Website

Pacific Airlines Address : 3rd Floor, Vietnam Airlines Operation Building, Tan Son Nhat Airport, Tan Binh District, Ho Chi Minh City, Viet Nam.

Phone number : +8428. 36280058
Fax: +8428. 35474515
Email: tovts.sro@pacificairlines.com.vn

List of Booking Offices in Pacific Airlines

City Address
Ho Chi Minh city 112 Hong Ha St, Ward 2, Tan Binh Dist. Working hours: Mon – Sat: From 8:00am to 12:00pm and from 13:00pm to 17:00pm Sun: Closed Tel: 028 7100 1550, 028 7101 1550 Email: tovts.sro@pacificairlines.com.vn Tan Son Nhat Domestic Airport. Tel: +84 28 3848 7176
Ha Noi 04 Trang Thi St, Hang Trong Ward, Hoan Kiem Dist. Working hours: Mon – Fri: From 8:00 to 12:00 and from 13:30 to 17:00 Sat & Sun: Closed Tel: +84 24 39550550 Email: trangthi.ticket@pacificairlines.com.vn Noi Bai airport – Lobby E, 2nd floor Tel/Fax: +84 24 3584 4468
Da Nang 253 Nguyen Van Linh Working hours: Mon – Fri: From 8:00 to 12:00 and from 13:30 to 17:30 Sat & Sun: Closed Tel: +84 236 3583583 Fax: +84 236 3583020 Email: ticketing_nvl@pacificairlines.com.vn Da Nang airport Tel: +84 236 364 6646
Hai Phong 36 Hoang Van Thu St., Hong Bang Dist. Tel: +84 225 3559 550 Fax: +84 225 3559 995 Cat Bi Airport Tel: +84 225 3559 737
Nghe An Vinh airport Tel: +84 238 3519619
Thanh Hoa Tho Xuan airport Tel: +84909435335
Buon Ma Thuot Buon Ma Thuot Airport Tel: +84 262 3811 550 Email: bmvairport@pacificairlines.com.vn Office & Booking office Tel: +84 262 3766888 Email: bmv.ticket@pacificairlines.com.vn
Nha Trang Cam Ranh Airport Tel: +84 258 2228266, +84 903506166
Phu Quoc Phu Quoc Airport Tel: +84 297 3992293 Fax: +84 297 3992294 Email: phongvepqc.sro@pacificairlines.com.vn
Thua Thien Hue 12 Hung Vuong St, Hue City Tel: +84 234 3955955 Fax: +84 234 3817789 Hue airport Tel: +84 234 3955255 Fax: +84 234 3955255
Dong Hoi Dong Hoi airport Tel: +84 232 33772858
Tuy Hoa 216 Tran Hung Dao, Dist. Tuy Hoa Tel: +84 257 3818635 Tuy Hoa Airport Tel: +84 257 3559116
Chu Lai Chu Lai Airport Tel: +84 235 3 535 510
Quy Nhon Phu Cat airport Tel: +84 256 3537559
Pleiku Pleiku airport Tel: +84 269 3720899

Pacific Airlines Official website : https://www.pacificairlines.com/vn/en/

Fleet size: 16

  • Airbus A320-232

Pacific Airlines Baggage Allowance

View Pacific Airlines Hand | Cabin baggage, Checked baggage, Excess baggage charges, over weight baggage charges, over size baggage charges in the above link.

Traveling while Pregnant Women in Pacific Airlines

  • Passengers with pregnancy between 28 weeks and 34 weeks must submit a doctor’s medical certificate.

For more details: https://www.pacificairlines.com/vn/en/travel-info/special-services/pregnant-women/

Traveling with Pets

  • Pets are not permitted in Pacific Airlines (dogs and cats)

Queries handled by Pacific Airlines Customer care:

Flight Ticket Booking, Ticket Cancellation, Flight Ticket Rescheduling, Ok to Board, Visa Services, Online Check-in, Baggage Allowance, Duty Free Allowance, Flight Information, Airport Lounges, Visa Information, In-Flight Meals, Airport Transfers, Missing Luggage, Immigration Services, Valet Parking, Meet and Greet, Flight Wifi, Airport Wifi, In-Flight Entertainment, Airport Facilities, Delayed Flights, Visa on Arrival, First Class, Business Class, Economy Class, Blue Sky Mongolia

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Pacific Airlines office in Vietnam Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Pacific Airlines office in Vietnam: (click on the stars below)
